verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against <S%H1121>you,<s%> children of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> against the whole <S%H4940>family<s%> which I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying:<s%>
"You only have I <S%H3045>chosen<s%> of all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%> Therefore I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you for all of your <S%H5771>sins.<s%>"

Will a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> in the <S%H3293>thicket,<s%> when he has no <S%H2964>prey?<s%> Does a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> cry <S%H5414>out<s%> of his <S%H4585>den,<s%> if he has <S%H3920>caught<s%> <S%H1115>nothing?<s%>

Can a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> in a <S%H4170>trap<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> where no <S%H6341>snare<s%> is set for <S%H6341>him?<s%> Does a snare spring <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H127>ground,<s%> when <S%H3920>there<s%> is nothing to <S%H3920>catch?<s%>

Does the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> alarm sound in a <S%H5892>city,<s%> without the <S%H5971>people<s%> being <S%H2729>afraid?<s%> Does <S%H7451>evil<s%> happen to a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>hasn't<s%> done it?

Surely the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1697>nothing,<s%> unless he <S%H1540>reveals<s%> his <S%H5475>secret<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>
The <S%H738>lion<s%> has <S%H7580>roared.<s%> Who will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear?<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> Who can but <S%H5012>prophesy?<s%>

<S%H8085>Proclaim<s%> in the <S%H759>palaces<s%> at <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and in the <S%H759>palaces<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H622>"Assemble<s%> yourselves on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7227>what<s%> <S%H4103>unrest<s%> is <S%H7130>in<s%> <S%H6217>her,<s%> and what oppression is among <S%H8432>them.<s%>"

"Indeed they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5229>right,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Who <S%H686>hoard<s%> <S%H2555>plunder<s%> and <S%H7701>loot<s%> in their <S%H759>palaces.<s%>"

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> "An <S%H6862>adversary<s%> will <S%H5439>overrun<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> and he will pull <S%H3381>down<s%> your <S%H5797>strongholds,<s%> and your <S%H759>fortresses<s%> will be <S%H962>plundered.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "As the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> rescues <S%H5337>out<s%> of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3767>legs,<s%> or a <S%H915>piece<s%> of an <S%H241>ear,<s%> so shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H5337>rescued<s%> who <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> on the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of a <S%H4296>couch,<s%> and on the silken <S%H1833>cushions<s%> of a <S%H4296>bed.<s%>"

<S%H8085>"Listen,<s%> and <S%H5749>testify<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H3069>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"For in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on <S%H6485>him,<s%> I will also visit the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> will be cut <S%H1438>off,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H2779>winter<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with the <S%H7019>summer<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> will <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> will have an <S%H5486>end,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
